text.text_translated:
Potentially Hazardous Asteroids are space rocks.  
They come near Earth, less than 7.5 million kilometres away.  
NASA has a map of 1,400 of them.  
None are a danger in the next hundred years.  
NASA has technology to track them.  
NASA can predict if they will hit Earth.  
NASA could launch two defence solutions.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Potentially Hazardous Asteroids are space rocks that can come close to Earth.  
They can pass less than seven million kilometres from Earth’s orbit.  
NASA has a map of 1,400 of these asteroids.  
None of them are a threat in the next hundred years.  
NASA has technology it can use now.  
It can track these asteroids.  
It can predict if they will hit Earth.  
It can use two protection plans to protect Earth.
